pullrequest.title: Fix memory leak in function that converts common::Image to msgs::Image

content.raw: Actually this code is not exceptoin safe. The best solution I think is to add GetData() method to common::Image that would return const unsigned char*. It woulde also more effecient (minus one image copy). Another way is to use shared_ptr.
content.html: Actually this code is not exceptoin safe. The best solution I think is to add GetData() method to common::Image that would return const unsigned char*. It woulde also more effecient (minus one image copy). Another way is to use shared_ptr.
